name: Commercial Metals Company
description: Commercial Metals Company (CMC) is a leading manufacturer, recycler, and fabricator of metal products in the United States. Founded in 1915, CMC has established itself as a key player in the metals industry, focusing on sustainability and innovation. The company operates through several segments, including steel manufacturing and recycling, where it processes scrap metal to produce high-quality steel products. CMC is known for its commitment to sustainability, employing advanced technologies to reduce waste and energy consumption in its operations. The company’s product offerings include rebar, wire rod, and other fabricated steel products, which are essential for a variety of construction and industrial applications. CMC has a strong presence across the U.S., with numerous recycling facilities and steel mills, allowing it to efficiently serve its customers. The company aims to provide superior customer service and quality products while fostering a culture of safety and environmental responsibility. As part of its growth strategy, CMC is continuously exploring opportunities for expansion and technological advancement in the metal sector, positioning itself as a leader in the industry.
